name: The Fallen (Raggun)
description:
The King has fled his castle after a coup by his brother, Baron Dark. The crystal that held colour together has been split in two and the Baron works to combine his essence to the shards so that he can gain control over light.

While the Baron plots and schemes against him, King Light rallies his forces in the village of Tres in the hopes of reclaiming what is his.

Who will win? You decide.
